flawed_nl_solution:
The classes in the pack cost $7.5 each because 75 / 10 = <<75/10=7.5>>7.5
An additional class costs $10 because 7.5 x (1 +(1/3)) = <<7.5*(1+(1/3))=10>>10
She buys 6 extra classes because 13 - 10 = <<13-10=6>>6
Her three additional classes cost $60 because 6 x 10 = <<6*10=60>>60
Her total cost is $135 because 75 + 60 = <<75+60=135>>135

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 3, not 6. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
